org.roug.osnine

Class RegisterBytePair

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.roug.osnine.Word
      • org.roug.osnine.RegisterBytePair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Register

    public class RegisterBytePair
extends Word
implements Register
    Word size register (i.e. 16 bit). The A and B accumulators are 8-bit registers, but for some instructions they can be used together to form the 16-bit D accumulator. Thus, the D accumulator is formed by using the B accumulator as the low byte, bits 0-7, and the A accumulator as the high byte, bits 8-15.
